tasks.label: DSA: Run Current File
args: case "${fileExtname}" in .js) node "${file}" < input.txt > output.txt ;; .java) javac "${file}" && java "${fileBasenameNoExtension}" < input.txt > output.txt ;; .cpp) g++ -std=c++17 "${file}" -O2 -o "${fileBasenameNoExtension}" && ./"${fileBasenameNoExtension}" < input.txt > output.txt ;; *) echo "Unsupported file type: ${fileExtname}" ;; esac
